about_the_game:
Gameplay

Odd Infinitum (Demo) is a 16-bit boss rush shoot-em-up featuring an intense boss battle and an arsenal of elite sci-fi weaponry at your disposal. You'll meet a small cast of characters of intriguing characters as well.

Story

The year is 3065.

In the 31st century, humanity expanded its reach beyond Earth and colonized a galaxy-spanning empire. Although alliances with certain alien races are tenuous, the human race enjoys a time of relative peace.

You are a spacecraft pilot freshly recruited from the academy into the United Systems Defense Force (U.S.D.F.), humanity's first line of defense against extraterrestrial threats.

After a distress signal is sent out from a remote asteroid colony, you are sent to investigate. What you encounter is unlike anything humanity has yet to see.

content_descriptors.notes:
Because Odd Infinitum (Demo) is set in space, the violence in this game mainly involves firing laser weapons at spaceships.  

This game does contain political themes, but they are very subtle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core or more
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with 2GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A good pair of headphones will do

short_description: Arm yourself with a variety of tactical weapons and take to the cosmos in a boss-rush shoot-em-up inspired by SNES shooters. You are a pilot fresh from the academy, thrust into a battle to defend humanity from the darkest abominations of the Infinitum. What lurks among the stars has a plan for you…
